sampling

Class WeightProportionalSampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • sampling.Sampler
      • sampling.WeightProportionalSampler

  • public class WeightProportionalSampler
extends Sampler
    A class that implements weight-proportional data sampling.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WeightProportionalSampler

        public WeightProportionalSampler(boolean repetitions,
                         float[] samplingWeights)
        Parameters:
        repetitions - Boolean flag denoting whether to use repetitive sampling or not.
        samplingWeights - float[] representing the weights for the weight-proportional selection scheme.

    • Method Detail

      • getSampleNoReps

        public static int[] getSampleNoReps(int sampleSize,
                    float[] samplingWeights)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the indexes of a weight-proportional sample, with no repetitions.
        Parameters:
        sampleSize - The size of the sample.
        samplingWeights - float[] representing the weights for the weight-proportional selection scheme. The length of this array is the population size.
        Returns:
        int[] of indexes of the weight-proportional sample.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the indexes of a weight-proportional sample, with possible repetitions.
        Parameters:
        samplingWeights - float[] representing the weights for the weight-proportional selection scheme. The length of this array is the population size.
        Returns:
        int[] of indexes of the weight-proportional sample.
